snippet.title: Assetto Corsa Competizione - Exclusive Next Gen Upgrade Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the new Assetto Corsa Competizione trailer, outlining what's on the horizon for its PS5 and Xbox Series X|S upgrade.

Players can upgrade their version of Assetto Corsa Competizione for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S for free on February 24, 2022. The Day One Edition will also be available for next gen consoles. The upgrade will increase the game's frame rate to a smooth 60FPS, and will let you transfer your old saves to your new console.

Other improvements include updated 2021 liveries and the option to create private multiplayer lobbies. Enjoy a progressive full day cycle and randomly generated weather as you race around Assetto Corsa Competizione's tracks.

#IGN #Gaming #AssettoCorsaCompetizione
